author: brett
msg: make sites go to the right place, and use new maven parent for the correct release profile

author: brett
msg: ditch the surrogate parent. It was getting out of date with everything copied from maven.
Go the other way and make reporting stuff in maven optional, and retain normal inheritence.
If we decide to make reporting compulsory again, it should be another parent pom between maven and the project (which the
plugins won't be able to use due to the circular dependency problem)

author: mturyn
msg: Centre a window that wants it at the end of init(); was earlier centering itself when its parent was of zero extent.
